About Me

Hello!

I'm Thong

I got into AI because of a Netflix recommendation that was surprisingly accurate. That sparked my curiosity about how machines learn patterns. Now I'm pursuing a Master's in AI at UTS in Sydney.

What I love about ML is that it's the perfect mix of math, coding, and problem-solving. There's something satisfying about training a model and watching it actually work.

I'm currently looking for internship opportunities where I can work on real-world AI problems and learn from experienced engineers. If you're hiring, let's chat!

Sydney, Australia

My Journey So Far

2024 - 2026

Master of Artificial Intelligence

University of Technology Sydney

Focusing on deep learning and computer vision. Currently working on a thesis about neural network interpretability.

2024

AI/ML Intern

Tech Startup in Sydney

Built recommendation systems and learned how messy real-world data actually is. Spent 80% of time cleaning data, 20% building models.

2020 - 2024

Bachelor of Computer Science

FPT University

Graduated with honors. My thesis on image classification won best project in the department (still proud of that).

Things I've Built

These projects taught me more than any tutorial ever could. Each one has a story.

01

Neural Vision Classifier

Built a CNN for image classification that achieved 95% accuracy on CIFAR-10. This was my first deep learning project and taught me a lot about overfitting.

PythonTensorFlowOpenCV
CodeDemo
02

NLP Sentiment Engine

Created a sentiment analysis tool for social media monitoring. The trickiest part was handling sarcasm - still working on that!

PythonPyTorchTransformers
CodeDemo
03

Predictive Analytics Dashboard

A business forecasting tool I built for a class project. My professor said the UI was 'surprisingly good for a backend person'.

PythonStreamlitPandas
CodeDemo
04

Movie Recommendation System

Like Netflix, but much simpler. Uses collaborative filtering to suggest movies based on what similar users liked.
